name: Cloudlands
description:
Embark on an epic journey in the dreamlike cloudlands, where what you can create is limited only by your imagination. With a rigorous dialogue system and crafting mechanics, you'll never run out of things to do in this wonderful realm.

Features:

  • Innovative construction system
  • Exciting resource gathering mechanics
  • NPC dialogue system
  • Many mysteries to solve
  • Difficult moral choices
  • Space adventures

We hope you enjoy your time with Cloud Lands!

Made by:

  • Andrew Persic (@yung-failure) - Coding, Art
  • Ango Zhu (@infraxion, website) - Coding, Art, Sound
  • Andrew Wilson (@chao) - Coding, Art
  • David Tenni - Coding, Art
  • Kris Lee - Writing

Software used:

  • Unity
  • MagicaVoxel
  • Aseprite
  • paint.net
  • FL Studio
  • RX
